trends: There have been 2 other sightings in New Rochelle
There were no other sightings in New Rochelle on or around July 24th 2013
Summary: Orb shapes, bright and misty and extreamly fast
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I was walking from my car to my apparent I first saw a cop car and then the lights in the sky I actually thought oh it must be a helicopter the cop was writing notes, I look up at the sky cause now I'm thinking umm there's no noise just the noise of crickets . The lights were swooshing in all different directions and crashing through each other and repeating it again it wasn't a light from the ground or another light source as the orbs were too big. I recorded it and ran inside to tell my husband to run out he did but it had gone.
